arts.ttl: Rennes and Sassuolo interested in Angers’ Haris Belkebla
arts.sum: It could be a long transfer window for SCO Angers. L’Équipe understands that their star player, Himad Abdelli (25) is the subject of interest from Olympique de Marseille. If Les Phocéens come knocking, it…
